Text: With New Delhi weighing a law that would make local storage mandatory, mining tycoon Gautam Adani wants to invest $10 billion in server farms in just one state.
Cause: With New Delhi weighing a law that would make local storage mandatory
Effect: mining tycoon Gautam Adani wants to invest $10 billion in server farms in just one state.
Sentence: <e1>With New Delhi weighing a law that would make local storage mandatory</e1>, <e2>mining tycoon Gautam Adani wants to invest $10 billion in server farms in just one state.</e2>
